title: Infocenter
description: ServiceNow Service Portal Designer and Developer.

title: TMD Creative
description: As the Director of User Interface Design, I led the design of modern and functional end-to-end experiences and interfaces, including participating in early ideation and prototyping. I was also responsible for developing the technical elements on a variety of front-end websites and mobile apps, utilizing HTML, PHP, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and MySQL. In my previous role as a Senior Web Developer, I designed and developed custom themes on numerous CMS platforms, including website and server optimization and maintenance. I worked closely with stakeholders to determine website specifications, estimated project costs and timely deliverable dates. In my freshman year at TMD Creative, as a Web Developer, I designed wireframes and built user interfaces and prototypes utilizing HTML, CSS and JavaScript markup.

title: Freelance Full-Stack Designer
description: Provided creative services in ideation and aesthetics, while implementing UI/UX design and front-end development, for responsive websites, mobile apps and e-commerce projects.

title: Transportation Agency for Monterey County (TAMC)
description: As the webmaster at TAMC, I was responsible for redesigning, developing and maintaining their state agency website, utilizing design principles and HTML, CSS and JavaScript markup.
